meanings.definition: Situated or occurring before the anus.
meanings.sent1: The preanal scales on the snake help it move smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The preanal fin of the fish assists in its balance.
meanings.sent3: The preanal markings on the caterpillar looked like tiny rainbows.
meanings.sent4: Her preanal instincts warned her of the impending danger.
meanings.sent5: The preanal position of the nest protected the eggs from predators.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the area in front of the anus.
meanings.sent1: The preanal glands in the dog help with scent marking.
meanings.sent2: The preanal region of the body is sensitive to touch.
meanings.sent3: The preanal area of the playground was where the children gathered.
meanings.sent4: His preanal reaction to the joke was to burst into laughter.
meanings.sent5: The preanal examination revealed no abnormalities in the patient.
